name: Adventure Slime (itch)
description:
Adventure Slime is a game which you progress through the level as a little slime where you transform and morph into new shapes to complete the obstacles that get in your way. Your job is to reach your home which is 'The Land Of Slime' and ensure you do not get venture too far ever again.(But that will happen)

The game is still in progress, slightly buggy with things such as collision issues but all in all quite a fun and challenging game.

This is my first game I have ever attempted and I thought why not try Itch.io

All feedback is greatly appreciated.

I put the game up for free as it is my first game. I have only started making games so I feel I did pretty good making this one. I would greatly appreciate a small donation just to let me know that I am doing a good job. Thankyou all :D
